pageProps.content: ## Overview of Ballerina Swan Lake 2201.6.3 Swan Lake 2201.6.3 is the third patch release of Ballerina 2201.6.0 (Swan Lake Update 6) and it includes a new set of bug fixes, and a few security improvements ## Update Ballerina Update your current Ballerina installation directly to 2201.6.3 by using the [Ballerina Update Tool](/learn/update-tool/) as follows. 1. Run `bal update` to get the latest version of the Update Tool. 2. Run `bal dist pull 2201.6.3` to update to this latest distribution. ## Install Ballerina If you have not installed Ballerina, then, download the [installers](/downloads/#swanlake) to install. ## Language updates ### Bug fixes To view bug fixes, see the [GitHub milestone for 2201.6.3 (Swan Lake)](https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang/milestone/161?closed=1).
